response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It's a valuable asset that I believe will greatly benefit you. Considering its quality and functionality, I propose a price of $95 for it. This offer includes a limited-time discount, making it an excellent value for your investment. I trust that you'll find this product to be worth every penny. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 95}
